item.description:
This is an FYI -

The Music Worcester organization is presenting a Yeol eum Son Concert on Wednesday, March 7th. Yeol eum Son was a Silver Medalist at the 2011 International chaikovsky Piano Competition. There is a reception with Ms. Son following the concert.

Music Worcester has graciously offered our meetup group a 10% discount to attend this performance. Use the link below and enter discount code "meetup" when checking out for the discount.

http://myemail.constantcontact.com/Pianist--Yeol-eum-Son-in-Concert-.html?soid=1102398051641&aid=tQOnmES7TsA

Here is more info on Yeol eum Son.

﻿﻿www.yeoleumson.com

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Yeol eum Son Concert
